## ButtonKitPredicate

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/components/interactive/button/ButtonKit.ts" sourceLine="22" packageName="commandkit" />

The predicate function that filters button interactions.
It receives a ButtonInteraction and returns a boolean or a Promise that resolves to a boolean.

```ts title="Signature"
type ButtonKitPredicate = (
  interaction: ButtonInteraction,
) => Awaitable<boolean>
```
